ne23:2.2_0: “Steady, protect the three kinds of good conduct.”
ne23:2.4_0: “Pessa right view, it shatters the mass of right view.
ne23:2.5_0: “The profit isn’t oppressed by seeing the level of the native land.”
ne23:2.6_0: “The mendicants are using this energy for attaining the unattained.”
ne23:2.7_0: “From to be reborn in a bad place.”
ne23:2.8_0: always on the state of meditation.
